title: Domain-Specific LLM Fine-Tuning & Foundational Model Building
description: Fine-tuned LLMs like BERT and GPT using supervised fine-tuning, PEFT (LoRA), and GRPO for agriculture, finance, and insurance domains. Built foundational LLMs tailored to specific business tasks with optimization pipelines and advanced prompt engineering.

title: NLP-to-SQL & Knowledge Graph-Based Question Answering
description: Developed NLP-to-SQL pipelines enabling users to perform natural language queries on relational databases. Integrated vector search and knowledge graphs to support semantic search and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) via Django REST APIs.

title: Multimodal Retrieval System for Agri & Insurance Domains
description: Built multimodal search system using image and text embeddings to enable querying of harvest reports and insurance data. Exposed retrieval functionality through secure REST endpoints using Django REST Framework.

title: AI Agent Framework for Business Intelligence Automation
description: Developed multi-agent LLM frameworks for automating reporting, data summarization, and business insights. Deployed backend using Django REST Framework to serve agent tasks and orchestrate LLM workflows in real-time.

title: Graph Neural Networks for Knowledge Representation
description: Modeled complex entity relationships using Graph Neural Networks for recommendation and talent-matching systems. Designed hybrid recommenders with collaborative filtering and graph-based retrieval using LightFM and RecBole.

title: Talent Acquisition Agent with PDF Parsing and LLM Integration
description: Automated candidate profiling by converting resumes from PDFs to Markdown format using PyMuPDF and custom parsing logic. Integrated LLM agents for job-fit matching and skill extraction, with backend served via Django REST API.
